alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:12AM CST until January 13 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Monroe, Clarke and Wilcox Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 43.0 feet, Access to Eureka Landing community stops, with access cut off. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 38.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 42.7 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
